text: Tokyo Purin (東京プリン) was a Japanese music band that was active from 1997 until 2014, they were signed to the record label, Avex Inc. The band is best known for performing their version of Doraemon no Uta, which was used from 2002 until 2003. One of the members of this musical group passed away at the age of 49 on February 7, 2014, 10 days before what would've been his 50th birthday. == References == Category:Musical groups
title: Tokyo Purin
